programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.category: Action, Crime, Drama, Action, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller
programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.review:

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi","dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
Im Netz der Spinne
programme.desc:
Along Came a Spider: Directed by Lee Tamahori. With Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker. When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0164334/","name":"Along Came a Spider","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTVlY2VhMWEtYmRlOC00YWVhLWEzMDktZWJlYzNiMWJmZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0164334/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nahret"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Underrated. 7 of 10.","reviewBody":"The plot starts out in a very straight-forward manner: a man with an ambition to become criminal legend kidnaps the daughter of a congressman right out from under the nose of the FBI. He then sends a note and a sneaker of the girl to Detective Alex Cross, hence forcing him out of his self-inflicted isolation, the reasons of which are explained in the opening scene. Along with the FBI agent who was in charge of security at the scene of the crime, he follows the clues laid out by the kidnapper in order to find the girl. And so the story goes. 

The kidnapper is portrayed by the always formidable Michael Wincott, the best serial villain on that side of the Atlantic. He should have the Best Supporting Role awards piled up in his attic. Alex Cross, whom we remember from "Kiss the Girls", and portrayed by Morgan Freeman, is just the kind of cop you like best: sincere, sympathetic, intelligent, thorough and committed. Monica Potter features as the FBI agent determined to redeem herself after she let the kidnapper escape. 

This may not be a blockbuster, but this solid and underrated thriller delivers what so few of them have to offer these days: a final plot twist that genuinely surprises. It shall not be revealed here.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81004,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2001-09-05","keywords":"police officer,kidnapping,ransom,based on novel,impersonating a police officer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4129013273","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVhYjdmNGUtYWU5Ni00ODVmLWE2ZDQtNDNlMzg4MGUzNDIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVhYjdmNGUtYWU5Ni00ODVmLWE2ZDQtNDNlMzg4MGUzNDIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000699/","name":"Michael Wincott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005321/","name":"Monica Potter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848414/","name":"Lee Tamahori"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031847/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666248/","name":"James Patterson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609031/","name":"Marc Moss"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: L.A. Confidential: Directed by Curtis Hanson. With Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, James Cromwell. As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119488/","name":"L.A. Confidential","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDQ2YzEyZGItYWRhOS00MjBmLTkzMDUtMTdjYzkyMmQxZTJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119488/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tfrizzell"},"dateCreated":"2000-06-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A "Chinatown" for the 1990s","reviewBody":""L.A. Confidential" is brilliant. The screenplay and direction are second-to-none. The performances by the ensemble cast are also superb. Kim Basinger stands out the most with her Oscar-winning role. Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, James Cromwell, David Strathairn, and Danny DeVito all have their moments as well. The film deals with the seamy side of Los Angeles in the post-World War II 1950s. Los Angeles is a place of shady dealings and police corruption. To add to those problems is the creation of the smutty tabloid. Multi-layered and smart, "L.A. Confidential" will be the greatest survivor of the films released in 1997. 5 out of 5 stars."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":552055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1997-09-19","keywords":"corruption,murder,1950s,call girl,neo noir","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"L.A. Confidential","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1124073497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VlMDk1OTQtODY4Ny00ZGMzLWI4MWUtZWMwOTBmZjE2YTdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VlMDk1OTQtODY4Ny00ZGMzLWI4MWUtZWMwOTBmZjE2YTdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for L.A. Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0098844/","name":"Law & Order","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzViNWZjZTQtMzNkMi00ZTIxLWE1NmMtMmUwOTg4OWMyYmI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0098844/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"domino1003","dateCreated":"2004-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for Briscoe and McCoy!","reviewBody":"To be honest, I didn't become a real fan of the series until Jerry Orbach (Detective Briscoe)and Sam Waterston(EADA McCoy)came into the picture. This is when the series starts to pick up steam. Watching the show, you can't help but laugh at Briscoe's remarks or feel the passion of McCoy. Both of these men want justice, and will do everything within limits to bring the wrongdoers to justice. What I really like about the show is the wonderful twists and turns that they throw to the audience, as well as the "ripped from the headlines" episodes. Even though you have 2 more in the "Law And Order" franchise, the original is STILL the best!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33425,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1990-09-13","keywords":"shared universe,copaganda,profanity,ampersand in title,punctuation in title","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001583/","name":"Jerry Orbach","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0552509/","name":"Jesse L. IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"muffiness","dateCreated":"2006-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is a great show!","reviewBody":"I really love this show. I have always been interested in criminal psychology, and after going to school for a degree in Criminal Justice, someone (my professor) told me that this show was starting up and to watch it.

It is so wonderful! It really goes in depth with how profiling really works. It keeps a great story line all the way through, with many twists and bizarre themes. The characters in the show are established very well, with interesting personalities that really hold the show together.

Crime+Psychology=Criminal Minds.

And that's the truth.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176588,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi","dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zombieland
Bienvenue à Zombieland
programme.desc:
Zombieland: Directed by Ruben Fleischer. With Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Emma Stone, Abigail Breslin. A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1156398/","name":"Zombieland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDg0NTQ1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA4Mjg3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1156398/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akerdan"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Actually quite fun","reviewBody":"I just was exiting the theater after seeing '9', which is also worth a look, when my friend and I were offered tickets to a preview screening of Zombieland, which began almost immediately. I had seen previews for this picture, but I'd say this exceeded my expectations, which isn't to say masterpiece, but it was certainly entertaining, and at about 90 minutes, didn't really overstay it's welcome. 

As you might expect for this genre, it's quite gory, so don't go expecting a light 'R' rating. But if you can handle some bloodshed, no, make that a substantial amount of bloodshed - but perhaps I should add in a comic environment - there's some pretty funny stuff here. Woody Harreleson and Jesse Eisenberg make an amusing odd couple and Emma Stone was fine for this material, although she and Abigale Breslin had slightly less to do. 

I'm certainly no expert on the horror genre or the zombie sub-genre, but I can say that this wasn't as scary as Shaun of the Dead, in fact not very scary at all, I may have jumped back just a tiny bit a few times; however I may have laughed more. However I'm sure it does make a difference that I saw 'Shaun' alone on DVD, while 'Zombieland' I watched in a theater full of people laughing, clapping and cheering. 

Let's face it, you know what's going to happen in this flick, but I'm happy to say, plot conventions and all, this delivers enough laughs so if you know what you're getting into I doubt you'll regret laying down the price of admission for this sucker. Should you see it, see it opening night - if I haven't made it clear enough already, this is the kind of movie where the more enthusiastic people in the theater, the more fun it will be. And to end on a very positive note, 'Zombieland' does feature what just might go down in history as the best celebrity cameo of all time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":540788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-01-06","keywords":"zombie,amusement park,twinkie,on the road,actor playing himself","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The "Kick-Ass Girls" of Zombieland","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi179635481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Zombieland featurette"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251986/","name":"Jesse Eisenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1297015/","name":"Emma Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281508/","name":"Ruben Fleischer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Top of the Shorts
programme.desc: Chaque dimanche, Top of the Shorts fait la part belle à une grande variété de courts métrages qu'elle propose en version originale sous-titrée. L'émission met en valeur une discipline exigeante qui séduit autant les jeunes comédiens ou réalisateurs que des artistes renommés.

programme.title: The Spy Gone North
programme.desc: Après la Seconde Guerre mondiale, la Corée est dominée par les Etats-Unis au Sud et par l'URSS au Nord. La guerre de Corée éclate le 25 juin 1950 et fait plus de trois millions de victimes. Même après l'armistice de 1953, la guerre froide règne des deux côtés, employant d'innombrables espions. En 1992, les services secrets de Corée du Sud, au courant des travaux du Nord sur une arme nucléaire, tentent d'en savoir plus. Park Seok-young, un ancien officier, est chargé d'infiltrer les membres qui travaillent au programme nucléaire de Corée du Nord.

credits.actor: Hwang Jung-min
Young Hoon Jo

programme.category: Film d'espionnage

programme.title: Michael Kohlhaas
Michael Kohlhaas
programme.desc: Michael Kohlhaas: Directed by Arnaud des Pallières. With Mads Mikkelsen, Mélusine Mayance, Delphine Chuillot, David Kross. In the 16th century in the Cévennes, a horse dealer by the name of Michael Kohlhaas leads a happy family life. When a lord treats him unjustly, he raises an army and puts the country to fire and sword in order to have his rights restored." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2054790/","name":"Michael Kohlhaas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4MjM5MzA4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzA1NjUzMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 16th century in the Cévennes, a horse dealer by the name of Michael Kohlhaas leads a happy family life. When a lord treats him unjustly, he raises an army and puts the country to fire and sword in order to have his rights rest","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2054790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"activereasoner"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you liked this....","reviewBody":"Worth a watch for Mads fans, he definitely saves the show, and makes this film memorable, which is more than can be said for the many completely forgettable films made these days. If you know the book on which this film is based, it's easy to follow, but the plot is slow, disjointed, and leaves too much to the imagination of the viewer. For a really great interpretation of this legend, I highly recommend you see the 1999 HBO Western, The Jack Bull, starring John Cusack.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8147,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2013-08-14","keywords":"16th century,fight for justice,france,male pubic hair,army","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi188067097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM0NjAzNDMwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAxOTQ3MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM0NjAzNDMwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAxOTQ3MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":" With the age of feudalism in decline, Europe rests at a tense crossroads between the old world and the new. Respected, well-to-do horse merchant Michael Kohlhaas is a loving husband and family man leading a peaceful existence, until a ruthless nobleman steals his horses, setting off a chain of irreversible events. Kohlhaas resorts to extremes after these crimes destroy his livelihood and trust in the law, igniting a rampage through the countryside in his quest for justice. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586568/","name":"Mads Mikkelsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3274621/","name":"Mélusine Mayance"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161046/","name":"Delphine Chuillot"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0220774/","name":"Arnaud des Pallières"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055455/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017105/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0311019/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4663240/","name":"Christelle Berthevas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0220774/","name":"Arnaud des Pallières"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902535/","name":"Heinrich von Kleist"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Divisão
The Division
programme.desc: A Divisão: Directed by Vicente Amorim. With Erom Cordeiro, Thelmo Fernandes, Vanessa Gerbelli, Bruce Gomlevsky. In the 90s, Rio de Janeiro was shaken by a wave of kidnappings. Security forces call controversial agents to help save the city from thugs and also from the police itself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10648192/","name":"A Divisão","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE0OGYwYTMtMDAwYy00OWIyLThmZjUtOWEyODU2OWQxNWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 90s, Rio de Janeiro was shaken by a wave of kidnappings. Security forces call controversial agents to help save the city from thugs and also from the police itself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10648192/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tropa de ... abduction","reviewBody":"Ok I should not try to compare any movie coming from Brazil to the masterpiece (and I mean the sequel, although of course I also really liked the first Tropa de Elite movie too). This is a decent movie to say the least - and it is based on real events. So there is that for sure. And it is as down and gritty as you would it expect it to be.\n\nJust the first action scene ... there's no difference between this and a Hollywood Action movie with a similar theme. So no this is not polished, but not every movie needs that polish. The pacing could be a bit tighter, but that is a personal opinion on that, you may feel different. Overall more than decent and a testament on a certain period of time and what went down (more or less) in Brazil ...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":481,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-01-23","keywords":"police,kidnapping,brazilian police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1042708/","name":"Erom Cordeiro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1499052/","name":"Thelmo Fernandes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314078/","name":"Vanessa Gerbelli"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025241/","name":"Vicente Amorim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0687479/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026273/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0473686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025241/","name":"Vicente Amorim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5312404/","name":"Aurélio Aragão"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2032393/","name":"Gustavo Bragança"}],"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tomiris
programme.desc: A l'époque de l'apogée et de la puissance de l'empire perse, Cyrus le Grand avait conquis la moitié du monde. Mais le peuple Saka avait su conserver ses terres. Parmi ses habitants se trouvait la vaillante tribu des Massagètes. Spargapisès, vaillant guerrier de cette tribu, apprend, en rentrant d'une sanglante bataille que son épouse Bopaï, mourante, vient de lui donner un enfant, une fille, qu'elle baptise Tomiris. Les années passent et Spargapisès entraîne sa fille unique afin qu'elle devienne une guerrière forte et courageuse.
programme.category: Drame historique

programme.title: Intrigo: Samaria
Intrigo : Samaria
programme.desc: Intrigo: Samaria: Directed by Daniel Alfredson. With Phoebe Fox, Andrew Buchan, Millie Brady, Jeff Fahey. Nineteen-year-old Vera Kall cycles home through the night. She arrives at a farm, leaves her bike and sneaks quietly in through the door. She enters the kitchen and doesn't even have time to notice that she's not alone. The sudden blow is heavy and knocks Vera headlong onto the kitchen floor where she is left lying. Henry is a successful copywriter in Antwerp. One day he is approached by Paula, a documentary filmmaker. Ten years earlier, she was Vera's classmate. Now she plans to make a film about Vera and wants Henry to become involved as he was their teacher back then in the city of Münster. Despite his plea of innocence Jakob Kall sits imprisoned for the murder of his daughter. This tragic and brutal story brings Paula and Henry together as they search for the truth behind what really happened, and why Vera's body was never found. Both Henry and Paula carry well-hidden secrets which are slowly and inexorably forced out into the open. But the big question remains; is the man incarcerated in the maximum-security section of Bittinger prison really Vera's killer?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6341108/","name":"Intrigo: Samaria","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNlNTY5YWEtNTVlOC00MjllLWI2YmQtOTljY2FlMWRjYjA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg4MDYyNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Nineteen-year-old Vera Kall cycles home through the night. programme.title: Garçon chiffon
Garçon chiffon
programme.desc:
Garçon chiffon: Directed by Nicolas Maury. With Nicolas Maury, Nathalie Baye, Arnaud Valois, Théo Christine. Jeremie, a young man at his breaking point, leaves Paris to return to his intrusive mother in Limosin." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11093134/","name":"Garçon chiffon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDFhZWE3MTItMjE3Ni00Zjc5LThhM2UtNzVhNTIzNmYwZGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTI0MjI0NTc0._V1_.jpg","description":"Jeremie, a young man at his breaking point, leaves Paris to return to his intrusive mother in Limosin.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11093134/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rag mama rag","reviewBody":"I certainly have a problem with Nicolas Maury: be he straight ("les envoutés" ) or gay (this movie) ,his affected delivery gets on my nerves ;his hangdog look is more exasperating than moving ; it's just an opinion,and some (particularly the highbrow critics) find him sublime:there's no accounting for taste .

"Boys like us" also tells the sentimental problems of three gays but the results were always credible and the movie ,whilst showing respect for the audience , was accessible to anyone .

This one may make some take to their heels after 30 minutes because the scenes don't make any dramatic progression ;but fortunately , Natalie Baye appears as a mom who calls her boy "chiffon" (=rag) ,hence the title ;Baye could blow anyone off the screen but her part is underwritten,and she was never given a single chance to really shine ; she's not so over possessive a mother ,one has seen worse in this field. Theo Christine gives his director a run for his money in the scene by the pool , one of the rare ones in which the movie seems to go somewhere .On the other hand, Laura Calmy's hysterical fit of anger is absolutely unbearable :did she want to surpass Liz Taylor in "who's afraid of Virginia Woolf? Happily , she's got only one scene !

The movie is supposed to depict a gay man's jealousy ,but it's hardly obvious (his partner,a vet ,has an affair with another man,his mother is helped by a man who might take her from him ,but these scenes are few and far between) and it does not compare favorably with Chabrol's "l'enfer" .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":281,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-10-28","keywords":"male frontal nudity,male nudity,male rear nudity,gay,gay interest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1766309401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzczMTQwNzQtYjQxYS00ZmRhLThkNmUtMGY5NmFmY2JlNmFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzczMTQwNzQtYjQxYS00ZmRhLThkNmUtMGY5NmFmY2JlNmFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2072440/","name":"Nicolas Maury"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000882/","name":"Nathalie Baye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1798489/","name":"Arnaud Valois"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2072440/","name":"Nicolas Maury"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0423337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0620519/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0613914/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1444949/","name":"Maud Ameline"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277230/","name":"Sophie Fillières"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2072440/","name":"Nicolas Maury"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Énorme
Enorme
programme.desc: Énorme: Directed by Sophie Letourneur. With Marina Foïs, Jonathan Cohen, Jacqueline Kakou, Ayala Cousteau. A world traveling pianist and her husband have decided not to have a baby, but then he sees a surprise childbirth on a flight and tampers with her pill." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8076110/","name":"Énorme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjhlZTk2ZWYtMTBhZS00YmMxLTliYmYtNzU4ZjA4NTY4YjI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYxNzY5MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A world traveling pianist and her husband have decided not to have a baby, but then he sees a surprise childbirth on a flight and tampers with her pill.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8076110/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alainfranzolini"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intellectual humor in a poor movie","reviewBody":"A dysfunctional couple: she's a famous piano player, he is organising her professional life and doing everything for here so she can focus 100% on her work. Actually he is living her life and they have no children because she doesn't want to. One day he decides that he wants a child and contributes to her pregnancy by replacing her pill with sweeteners and she gets pregnant. Here I stop my boring review because the movie is even more boring. Apart from a few funny scenes (all in the trailer) the film is dramatically amateuristic. programme.title: Intrigo: Samaria
Intrigo : Samaria
programme.desc: Intrigo: Samaria: Directed by Daniel Alfredson. With Phoebe Fox, Andrew Buchan, Millie Brady, Jeff Fahey. Nineteen-year-old Vera Kall cycles home through the night. She arrives at a farm, leaves her bike and sneaks quietly in through the door. She enters the kitchen and doesn't even have time to notice that she's not alone. The sudden blow is heavy and knocks Vera headlong onto the kitchen floor where she is left lying. Henry is a successful copywriter in Antwerp. One day he is approached by Paula, a documentary filmmaker. Ten years earlier, she was Vera's classmate. Now she plans to make a film about Vera and wants Henry to become involved as he was their teacher back then in the city of Münster. Despite his plea of innocence Jakob Kall sits imprisoned for the murder of his daughter. This tragic and brutal story brings Paula and Henry together as they search for the truth behind what really happened, and why Vera's body was never found. Both Henry and Paula carry well-hidden secrets which are slowly and inexorably forced out into the open. But the big question remains; is the man incarcerated in the maximum-security section of Bittinger prison really Vera's killer?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6341108/","name":"Intrigo: Samaria","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNlNTY5YWEtNTVlOC00MjllLWI2YmQtOTljY2FlMWRjYjA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg4MDYyNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Nineteen-year-old Vera Kall cycles home through the night. programme.title: No Sudden Move
No Sudden Move
programme.desc:
No Sudden Move: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With Don Cheadle, Craig muMs Grant, Brendan Fraser, Benicio Del Toro. A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11525644/","name":"No Sudden Move","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI2ZDQxZDQtZDMxZi00ZWFhLTg1OGYtYmFkMjRkMDc2NDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11525644/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"siderite"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stellar cast and director going nowhere","reviewBody":"This is a heist movie. For any heist movie, you're better off just re-watching "One Crew over the Crewcoo's Morty". The genre is formulaic by design, often involves a cast of very well known people and movies in it should be performance pieces. I mean, no one cares about the loot or what happens in the end, they just want to be entertained by the loops and twists of the story and the way actors make you care about their characters. And on that metric, No Sudden Move is average at best.

Right now I am struggling to mention anything that might be worth mentioning and getting nothing. It's not like people acted badly, but their characters were completely uninteresting and the story went nowhere. Even if it was "inspired" from the story of the catalytic converter and the collusion of all big car manufacturers to keep it off the market, which is true, the rest was complete fiction. And the plot? Just people double and triple crossing each other. No action, no real stakes, no inspiring end. Just Soderbergh being nostalgic over the times when the Ocean's N movies were bringing him a lot of money.

Bottom line: I can't recommend it yet I can't say it was a bad movie. It was just... uninteresting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21314,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-07-01","keywords":"criminal,work,together,job,mysterious","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3678191641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4MTc3YmItZDVkYS00YzNkLWI4YjAtYmUwMTIxODcyZjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4MTc3YmItZDVkYS00YzNkLWI4YjAtYmUwMTIxODcyZjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1955 Detroit, a group of small-time criminals are hired to steal emerging car technology. When their plan goes horribly wrong, their search for who hired them - and for what ultimate purpose - weaves them through all echelons of the race-torn, rapidly changing city."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000332/","name":"Don Cheadle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001125/","name":"Benicio Del Toro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1092086/","name":"David Harbour"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001752/","name":"Steven Soderbergh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754095/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784743/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Felicità: Directed by Bruno Merle. With Pio Marmaï, Rita Merle, Camille Rutherford, Orelsan. For Tim and Chloe, happiness is day-to-day and unattached. But tomorrow summer ends. programme.title: L'équipier
L'équipier
programme.desc:
L'équipier: Directed by Philippe Lioret. With Sandrine Bonnaire, Philippe Torreton, Grégori Derangère, Émilie Dequenne. Camille arrives at the island Ouessant where she was born, to sell the house of her parents. She finds a book of a certain Antoine and starts reading. A story of a stranger is told who came 1963 to the island. He wasn't well received and left again after 2 month." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0388562/","name":"L'équipier","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMTMxMTM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk2OTgyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Camille arrives at the island Ouessant where she was born, to sell the house of her parents. She finds a book of a certain Antoine and starts reading. A story of a stranger is told who came 1963 to the island. He wasn't well received","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"helenemichelcardin"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"The picture, the story, the intensity of feelings ; perfect combination","reviewBody":"About the injured hand change in the middle of the film : it was filmed with the good one but the director decided afterward, for aesthetic reasons, to flip the image in the computer so the characters and everything else in that scene appear as though it was filmed conversely. He said it in an interview.

The dramatic tension builds up with the emotions of each character. We feel exactly as they feel. The rejection of the stranger by many of them is especially strong, and their angriness towards him all collapse magnificently when he reveals, in a Coup-De-theater scene near the end, why precisely he lost the use of his hand. Another fascinating psychological evolution : the complete rejection of him by his lighthouse partner that slowly but surely becomes esteem and friendship. 

A story that looks typical at the start but that nevertheless brings an extraordinary personal view of people, not to mention the sea views that are just breathtaking."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1513,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-11-03","keywords":"island,book,stranger,rural setting,wave","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094789/","name":"Sandrine Bonnaire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868881/","name":"Philippe Torreton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246362/","name":"Grégori Derangère"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0513371/","name":"Philippe Lioret"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085679/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0183686/","name":"Emmanuel Courcol"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267064/","name":"Claude Faraldo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0499448/","name":"Gilles Legrand"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The L Word: Generation Q
Genera+ion
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 Pilot
programme.desc: The L Word: Generation Q: Created by Michele Abbott, Ilene Chaiken, Kathy Greenberg, Marja-Lewis Ryan. With Jennifer Beals, Katherine Moennig, Leisha Hailey, Arienne Mandi. Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7661384/","name":"The L Word: Generation Q","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY2ZTE4NzAtMzgyOC00NmY4LTlhZDktZGRhYTNlNzFlODliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7661384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"umwotulookin"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"L is for lost","reviewBody":"I'm biased in writing this since I'm comparing the original but one can't help do that when some of the same cast members are in this one. What I loved about the first one was it's rawness, it's artiness, it's intellect. No one, besides Bette maybe, was established and you're watching this group of gay friends find their way in life with all the drama in tow. Some storylines were risqué for the time, which made it all the more interesting. Cut to now and all of our beloved characters are well established, living these high flying lives that just seems so untrue to the characters that they were and it takes away a certain quality and relatability from them. We're now expected to find this in these new characters but the writing just doesn't quite live up to that same quirky standard. I understand this is a different show and perhaps they had to sell it that way to bring it back, perhaps they felt they needed a younger generation for a younger audience to relate to. It's not a bad show and the new characters aren't terrible, but there's a certain depth missing here. There was more to the L Word than affairs, it was about power dynamics, whilst at the same time being goofy and at times off the wall. GQ seems lost in a soap opera style drama and that comedic aspect seems absent. IMDb data; ttnr: 7661384, Title: The L Word: Generation Q, --- Description: The L Word: Generation Q: Created by Michele Abbott, Ilene Chaiken, Kathy Greenberg, Marja-Lewis Ryan. With Jennifer Beals, Katherine Moennig, Leisha Hailey, Arienne Mandi. Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7661384/","name":"The L Word: Generation Q","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY2ZTE4NzAtMzgyOC00NmY4LTlhZDktZGRhYTNlNzFlODliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7661384/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"umwotulookin","dateCreated":"2021-08-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"L is for lost","reviewBody":"I'm biased in writing this since I'm comparing the original but one can't help do that when some of the same cast members are in this one. What I loved about the first one was it's rawness, it's artiness, it's intellect. No one, besides Bette maybe, was established and you're watching this group of gay friends find their way in life with all the drama in tow. Some storylines were risqué for the time, which made it all the more interesting. Cut to now and all of our beloved characters are well established, living these high flying lives that just seems so untrue to the characters that they were and it takes away a certain quality and relatability from them. We're now expected to find this in these new characters but the writing just doesn't quite live up to that same quirky standard. I understand this is a different show and perhaps they had to sell it that way to bring it back, perhaps they felt they needed a younger generation for a younger audience to relate to. It's not a bad show and the new characters aren't terrible, but there's a certain depth missing here. There was more to the L Word than affairs, it was about power dynamics, whilst at the same time being goofy and at times off the wall. GQ seems lost in a soap opera style drama and that comedic aspect seems absent. Which for an audience still deprived of real representation in the mainstream, might not seem that bad, but for others expecting more than this, you'll likely be disappointed.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4263,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-08","keywords":"lesbian","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000884/","name":"Jennifer Beals","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595485/","name":"Katherine Moennig","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0354157/","name":"Leisha Hailey"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052980/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271093/","name":"Michele Abbott","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149669/","name":"Ilene Chaiken","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271884/","name":"Kathy Greenberg"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 2 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3625959449","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYzNGQzZjQtZGYxOS00OTRiLTg2ZDEtYzhhMmQzYzU5NjMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYzNGQzZjQtZGYxOS00OTRiLTg2ZDEtYzhhMmQzYzU5NjMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 2 is available to stream August 6, 2021 on SHOWTIME."</script><metacontent="

Watch with Your Kids","reviewBody":"This is such a dumb movie but honestly that's what makes it so great. Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle is a fun movie that doesn't take itself seriously and it shows. Of course it's a twist on the original Jumanji movie that will never capture the same magic. But for everyone expecting it to be a giant flop, it ends up being pretty fun.\n\n3.5/5. programme.title: Road
programme.desc: Portrait des frères Joey et Robert Dunlop, champions de course de moto sur route, vainqueurs à plusieurs reprises du Tourist Trophy de l'île de Man. Les deux pilotes nords-irlandais sont décédés sur leur engin à quelques années d'intervalle. Ce documentaire revient sur la carrière d'une famille de passionnés de motos.
programme.category: Film documentaire

programme.title: Neuilly sa mère
Neuilly sa mère !
programme.desc:
Neuilly sa mère!: Directed by Gabriel Julien-Laferrière. With Samy Seghir, Jérémy Denisty, Rachida Brakni, Denis Podalydès." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1349856/","name":"Neuilly sa mère!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2UxZGU2NmQtOGVlNC00Y2NmLWI5NzQtNzE2NWE1YTQ0MDY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTY0OTgzMzU@._V1_.jpg","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1349856/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Chrysanthepop"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Samy Seghir steals the show","reviewBody":"Djamel Bensalah's story isn't anything original but the film is easy to relate to despite all the clichés and stereotypes. Perhaps the key reason is the characterization of the lead character Sami who is superbly played by Samy Seghir. Samy's sudden 'culture' shock from the underdeveloped crime-ridden French suburb to the riches of Neuilly and his struggles to keep up are portrayed effectively. Moreover, Seghir's performance is natural unlike a majority of the child actors seen on screen. 

Certain subplots remain underdeveloped even though the director and writer do try to tie it all up in the end. The comedy does feel forced at times, even feeling completely out of place but there is enough here to keep one entertained. The supporting cast performs adequately.

'Neuilly sa mère!' isn't among the finest of its kind but it has enough bright moments to be watchable with the family."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2262,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-08-12","keywords":"reference to the jonas brothers,2000s,parisian suburb,first person narration,city name in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi737524761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTAxY2VmZDQtN2MzZC00MmZhLThmMDUtNDIwMjI3ZjUyOTJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTAxY2VmZDQtN2MzZC00MmZhLThmMDUtNDIwMjI3ZjUyOTJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2027009/","name":"Samy Seghir"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2253175/","name":"Jérémy Denisty"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1021224/","name":"Rachida Brakni"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0480768/","name":"Gabriel Julien-Laferrière"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009070/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0278369/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0072354/","name":"Djamel Bensalah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154385/","name":"Philippe de Chauveron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3560371/","name":"Marc de Chauveron"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Un conte peut en cacher un autre
programme.desc: Et si chaque nuit, Jack, celui du conte au haricot magique, rêvait de Cendrillon ? Et si le Petit Chaperon rouge était la meilleure amie de Blanche-Neige ? Et si cette dernière était blonde ? Et si le loup ne croquait plus le petit cochon ? C'est que laisse supposer le loup qui se retrouve face à une baby-sitter nourrie aux contes de fées. Le loup s'empresse de lui raconter sa version de ses histoires, en omettant de dire qu'il a un passif avec Blanche-Neige et le Petit Chaperon (il a voulu en faire son dîner et qu'elle s'est bien défendue)...
programme.category: Téléfilm d'animation

Steve's team has to find more evidence before the perpetrator is released from prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt11649104/","name":"The Pembrokeshire Murders","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE2ZDY0NTItNGU5NS00MDBkLWFjMmItYzdkZjExMTFhZDUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Detective superintendent reopens two unsolved murder cases from the 1980s. Steve's team has to find more evidence before the perpetrator is released from prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11649104/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mcjames-63312"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent Police Drama based on the real events","reviewBody":"Unfortunately I think some reviews were expecting a shoot 'em up police story, hence their negative reviews. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 8760304, Title: Deutschland 89, --- Description: Deutschland 89: Created by Anna Winger, Jörg Winger. With Jonas Nay, Maria Schrader, Sylvester Groth, Corinna Harfouch. Martin Rauch experiences the fall of the Berlin Wall in November 1989 during his activities as an East German spy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8760304/","name":"Deutschland 89","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA2NzcxNWUtMTk1ZC00OTViLWFmMTQtMDdlZTBmMTUzN2ZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"Martin Rauch experiences the fall of the Berlin Wall in November 1989 during his activities as an East German spy.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8760304/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kimmt-07653","dateCreated":"2020-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty much jumped the shark","reviewBody":"A relatively weak offering compared to the first two seasons. Feels superficial and contrived on all levels with little or development of the what feels like 100s of side-storylines and characters. A few genuinely funny moments (Sylvester Groth is great as always) and the odd moment of tension but mostly the lame tale of Martin trying to chase down his evil auntie all over Europe. Leaves you feeling like they really could have done so much more with this pivotal, explosive moment in German/European history. And the script writers obviously just called it in. The dialogue is so stilted at times, it feels like a high school play. A shout-out in particular to Lavinia Wilson who delivered a performance that, though barely possible, was even worse than the script. I thought my eyes would never be the same again, having rolled so often at her attempts at playing the femme fatale. Grauenhaft.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2183,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-25","keywords":"berlin germany,stasi,propaganda,loosely based on historical events,fall","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1909076/","name":"Jonas Nay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0775056/","name":"Maria Schrader","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0343857/","name":"Sylvester Groth"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010760/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5587681/","name":"Anna Winger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935028/","name":"Jörg Winger"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1621016857","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY2NWRmMmYtODMyMS00N2Y1LTllMTctMDFmMTBjNWRkZTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY2NWRmMmYtODMyMS00N2Y1LTllMTctMDFmMTBjNWRkZTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

A few genuinely funny moments (Sylvester Groth is great as always) and the odd moment of tension but mostly the lame tale of Martin trying to chase down his evil auntie all over Europe. Leaves you feeling like they really could have done so much more with this pivotal, explosive moment in German/European history. And the script writers obviously just called it in. The dialogue is so stilted at times, it feels like a high school play. A shout-out in particular to Lavinia Wilson who delivered a performance that, though barely possible, was even worse than the script. I thought my eyes would never be the same again, having rolled so often at her attempts at playing the femme fatale. Grauenhaft.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2183,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-25","keywords":"berlin germany,stasi,propaganda,loosely based on historical events,fall","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1909076/","name":"Jonas Nay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0775056/","name":"Maria Schrader","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0343857/","name":"Sylvester Groth"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010760/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5587681/","name":"Anna Winger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935028/","name":"Jörg Winger"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1621016857","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY2NWRmMmYtODMyMS00N2Y1LTllMTctMDFmMTBjNWRkZTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY2NWRmMmYtODMyMS00N2Y1LTllMTctMDFmMTBjNWRkZTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: House of Series
programme.desc: Aux Etats-Unis, de plus en plus de séries s'intéressent aux rouages de la politique et aux coulisses du pouvoir à la Maison-Blanche. En 1999, The West Wing a été l'une des premières fictions à dépeindre le quotidien du président américain et de son équipe. Cette série culte a inspiré nombre de scénaristes qui ont donné naissance à "House of cards", "Veep", "The loudest voice", ou encore "The Comey rule". Pourquoi la Maison-Blanche et son locataire inspirent-ils tant le sérail de la fiction ? Ce documentaire analyse cette tendance à travers les témoignages de producteurs et de showrunners comme Elie Attie (The west Wing), ou encore Michael Kelly (The Comey rule).
programme.category: Cinéma

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Présenté par le talentueux Jimmy Fallon, The Tonight Show, diffusé d'abord aux Etats-Unis, propose un moment unique : interviews décalées, gags délirants, parodies hilarantes, sketchs mythiques, défis rocambolesques. programme.title: Le cercle séries
programme.desc: Animée par une petite bande de chroniqueurs passionnés, cette émission mensuelle consacrée exclusivement aux séries passe en revue les sorties et les tournages qui font l'actualité des séries à succès et celles qui méritent d'être découvertes. Pourquoi certaines fictions accrochent et touchent plus que d'autres ? Les images seront analysés afin d'apporter un point de vue technique. Autour des séries évènements, des découvertes et des pépites, les débats sont garantis sans spoilers.
programme.category: Magazine culturel

programme.title: La grande illusion
La grande illusion
programme.desc:
La grande illusion: Directed by Jean Renoir. With Jean Gabin, Dita Parlo, Pierre Fresnay, Erich von Stroheim. During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0028950/","name":"La grande illusion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTI5NTk0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU1MDM5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0028950/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lechuguilla"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Its Historical Significance Is No Illusion","reviewBody":"Franklin Roosevelt said of it: "Everyone who believes in democracy should see this film". Mussolini banned it in Italy, and Hitler's Ministry of Propaganda banned it in Nazi Germany. The film vanished during WWII, and was thought to have been destroyed. Then it was recovered in 1946, but in an altered state. Decades would then pass before the original negative could be confirmed.

The Nazis hated the film because of its pacifist, anti-war, theme. The setting for the film is Germany in 1914, during WWI. Germans capture several French officers and take them to a POW camp, specifically for officers. After several escape attempts, the French officers get shuffled off to a presumably escape proof castle, run by Rauffenstein (Erich von Stroheim), a flamboyant German officer with a forbidding persona.

Unlike other war movies, "La Grande Illusion" shows no actual combat, and the number of deaths is minimal. The film's tone is surprisingly lighthearted. Writer/Director Renoir conveys a sense of community among the French prisoners, despite their differences in social class. We see them several times sitting around a table eating, and chatting amiably. The cordiality between prisoners and their jailers is also surprising. It's not exactly a hug fest, but the predominant feeling among the men is respect for fellow officers, even if those officers are your enemy. None of the French or German officers want war; it's just their "duty", when called on.

In most of the film, scenes take place in small rooms or in that castle. Toward the film's end, outdoor vistas provide a visual contrast. Except at the film's end, I was amazed at how drab the surroundings are. Room furnishings are unadorned and contain the barest of essentials. Tables and floors are made of simple wood. The clothes are dreary and depressing. The stone castle is dank and forbidding. Music is made with simple instruments, like a harmonica or a flute. Of course, given the time period and considering the setting, such drabness and simplicity are not surprising. But the contrast with today's complex world of modern luxuries, that we take for granted, is striking. The film's B&W cinematography accentuates the drab environment.

The story can be a bit confusing in the first half, because the relationship between the jailers and the prisoners is so unusual. Viewers need to give the film wide latitude on this. Watching the film a second time helps clarify who is doing what to whom. The plot is easier to follow in the second half.

The film's acting is credible. I especially liked the performance of von Stroheim, all decked out in that imposing uniform, that monocle, and with that stiff bearing.

"La Grande Illusion" is an unusual "war" film, one that had real significance during WWII. For this reason alone, it deserves to be seen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35270,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1937-10-04","keywords":"military,french soldier,upper class,prisoner of war camp,christmas","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grand Illusion: 75th Anniversary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1344124953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQxZTlhOGQtMmNlYy00Y2IyLWI3YmUtMjZjMTQ3MDJhNWY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQxZTlhOGQtMmNlYy00Y2IyLWI3YmUtMjZjMTQ3MDJhNWY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Grand Illusion"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0300064/","name":"Jean Gabin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0663077/","name":"Dita Parlo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294382/","name":"Pierre Fresnay"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719756/","name":"Jean Renoir"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053790/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0816458/","name":"Charles Spaak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719756/","name":"Jean Renoir"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="
