programme.title: London Has Fallen
La chute de Londres
programme.desc: London Has Fallen: Directed by Babak Najafi. With Alon Aboutboul, Waleed Zuaiter, Adel Bencherif, Mehdi Dehbi. In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3300542/","name":"London Has Fallen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1ODY2MTgwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTY3Nzc3NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3300542/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wizard-8"},"dateCreated":"2017-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Reasonably fun, if you are in the right mood","reviewBody":"As I have said before, I have a soft spot for movies made by Millennium Films, because they are the closest modern day equivalent to the notorious Cannon Films, which made a ton of cheesy but fun B grade movies in the 1980s. The Millennium Films production "London Has Fallen" is really a glorified Cannon movie, and that's why I had fun with it. Oh, I will admit that a lot of it is silly and/or bad. The CGI is often kind of cheap, the depiction of the story's terrorists and their intricate plans is really hard to swallow, and the movie is quite predictable. But it's enjoyable all the same. The first twenty five or so minutes are kind of slow, but then it starts delivering almost non stop action until the end. It's certainly never dull, and even a little exciting at times despite the fact you'll know how each scene will end as soon as it starts. I can see why some people would hate this movie, but for me, it was a fun romp. The more you like B movies, the better the chance you'll like this movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":151102,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-03-03","keywords":"terrorist,patriotism,female agent,american in the uk,good versus evil","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1266857241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTA2MDk3NTAwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMzMzk3NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTA2MDk3NTAwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMzMzk3NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning discovers a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0619836/","name":"Babak Najafi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332840/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018555/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4950667/","name":"Creighton Rothenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4951717/","name":"Katrin Benedikt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0345615/","name":"Christian Gudegast"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3300542, Title: London Has Fallen, --- Description: London Has Fallen: Directed by Babak Najafi. With Alon Aboutboul, Waleed Zuaiter, Adel Bencherif, Mehdi Dehbi. In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3300542/","name":"London Has Fallen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1ODY2MTgwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTY3Nzc3NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3300542/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Wizard-8","dateCreated":"2017-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Reasonably fun, if you are in the right mood","reviewBody":"As I have said before, I have a soft spot for movies made by Millennium Films, because they are the closest modern day equivalent to the notorious Cannon Films, which made a ton of cheesy but fun B grade movies in the 1980s. The Millennium Films production "London Has Fallen" is really a glorified Cannon movie, and that's why I had fun with it. Oh, I will admit that a lot of it is silly and/or bad. The CGI is often kind of cheap, the depiction of the story's terrorists and their intricate plans is really hard to swallow, and the movie is quite predictable. But it's enjoyable all the same. The first twenty five or so minutes are kind of slow, but then it starts delivering almost non stop action until the end. It's certainly never dull, and even a little exciting at times despite the fact you'll know how each scene will end as soon as it starts. I can see why some people would hate this movie, but for me, it was a fun romp. The more you like B movies, the better the chance you'll like this movie.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":151102,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-03-03","keywords":"terrorist,patriotism,female agent,american in the uk,good versus evil","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1266857241","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTA2MDk3NTAwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMzMzk3NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTA2MDk3NTAwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMzMzk3NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning discovers a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0619836/","name":"Babak Najafi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332840/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018555/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4950667/","name":"Creighton Rothenberger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4951717/","name":"Katrin Benedikt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0345615/","name":"Christian Gudegast"],"duration":"PT1H39M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
Terminator renaissance
programme.desc:
Terminator Salvation: Directed by McG. With Christian Bale, Sam Worthington, Moon Bloodgood, Helena Bonham Carter. In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0438488/","name":"Terminator Salvation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBlOTJhZjItMGRmYS00YzM1LWFmZTktOTJmNDMyZTBjMjBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0438488/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xenazues"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 80's and the 90's aren't coming back.","reviewBody":"I have seen a lot of reviews on here, more than I usually read. And it is way too many 1's. This movie is no where near a one rating. I've been watching a lot of movies since I was a little kid. From cheesy 80's flicks, to straight to TV. This is no where near a 1. This movie sits at a 7 for me. Would have got an 8 but I'm super hard on the female acting in these new generation of movies.

This movie by now is 9 years old so nothing would be giving it away. But with that said Linda Hamilton in the first one was 19 years old. And she can act. Which is why 7 or 8 years later in Terminator 2 her acting was polished the movie was even better. It is not a secret if the female character can act you are going to have a good movie. The female acting in this movie was decent which is why it got a 7 from me.

But I can see why people gave this a one. The first Terminators were scary. The machine just kept going. You also had the awesome 80's music, along with the clothes. I mean seriously Sarah O conner was riding an 80's scoter and listening to head phones. And going to the club. Just a lot of vintage stuff in that movie which brought it back to the 80's. The 90's was even better in T2, crazy hair cuts, dirt bikes and the graphics in that at the time were unique. 

But they did try to incorporate some of the old ideas. John Conner goes "come with me if you want to live", the motor cycle scene still is exciting as it was almost 30 years ago. The naked terminator. Normally during these remakes I get bored or fall asleep. It was action through the whole movie. I don't know if it was christian bale. Or who it was. But I felt entertained. 

If people came here looking at this review thinking they are get a play by play of the movie. I'm not doing that with this one. You have to watch and please don't listen to these negative reviews. They want to live in the past on something that has already been done. 

Once again don't try to watch this thinking this is going to be like the fist 2. It is not. Its just going to be great acting and simply a plot that action. Nothing over the top where its mind blowing. Expecting this movie to be like the first 1 where they were on to something new, and the second one where they had some super special effects is asking too much. It was well written movie. And its great to have all the Terminators. Cause I do.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":350788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-05-27","keywords":"kidnapping,pregnant woman,suspense,terminal illness,prisoner","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Terminator Salvation","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi360907545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzEwMTE3MDgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg0MzYxMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzEwMTE3MDgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg0MzYxMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Terminator Salvation - Trailer #2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941777/","name":"Sam Worthington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0947338/","name":"Anton Yelchin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629334/","name":"McG"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0175646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080859/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104335/","name":"John Brancato"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0274905/","name":"Michael Ferris"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gold
Gold
programme.desc:
Gold: Directed by Stephen Gaghan. With Matthew McConaughey, Edgar Ramírez, Bryce Dallas Howard, Corey Stoll. Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1800302/","name":"Gold","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjEwNzMzMDI4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM2ODkwMTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1800302/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LordManhattan"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A lot of content, not a lot of substance","reviewBody":"First of, Gold is better than its IMDb rating and meta-score. I feel this movie is a victim of the studio going wild with a pair of scissors, trying to make it short(er) (even at 2 hours) to please the mainstream audience, but while doing that, this movie loses a lot of substance. Character development is lacking, apart from our protagonist, so it doesn't really feel like we get to know them. One moment we have a new (seemingly an important) character, and then he or she will either disappear or roam in the background. I guess that happens when you start cutting. I suspect there's a great version of this movie out there, and I'd rather watch a 3 hour version with everything included, than this. The movie also takes place in the late 80's(?) or early 90's, but I don't feel like time was important here, which makes things a little confusing. I have no idea if they've been at something for a week, a month, or five years. 

The whole movie also feels a little rushed in the sense that it tries to get to the end as quickly as possible. It lacks the details; Slow down a little, speak to us, breathe. I want to know more, I want to see more, but it ends up being a National Geographic article instead of a book. 

It's far from bad though, and it's an enjoyable watch. Just don't go in expecting a masterpiece.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60575,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-01-27","keywords":"indonesia,gold,panning for gold,1980s,based on true story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1569109529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ4MjAzNzg5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY3MDUyMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ4MjAzNzg5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY3MDUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183149/","name":"Edgar Ramírez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397171/","name":"Bryce Dallas Howard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0300866/","name":"Stephen Gaghan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319513/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0377076/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0230125/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557266/","name":"Patrick Massett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957003/","name":"John Zinman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Enfermés dehors
Enfermés dehors
programme.desc: Enfermés dehors: Directed by Albert Dupontel. With Albert Dupontel, Claude Perron, Nicolas Marié, Hélène Vincent. The story of a glue-sniffing homeless person who stumbles upon a policeman committing suicide and decides to put his abandoned uniform to good use. Initially this means using it to steal food from the police canteen but soon Roland discovers that wearing the uniform gives him certain powers and responsibilities, particularly tracking down the kidnapped child of a former porn star whose picture he had fallen in love with." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0442207/","name":"Enfermés dehors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI1NTE5MjcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQ5MDg5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a glue-sniffing homeless person who stumbles upon a policeman committing suicide and decides to put his abandoned uniform to good use. Initially this means using it to steal food from the police canteen but soon Roland d","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0442207/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mks66"},"dateCreated":"2006-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"The worst movie ever made?","reviewBody":"I went to see "Enferme Dehors" expecting the worse and I got it. 90mn of relentless torture. This is not a poor man's Amelie Poulain or a modern Comedia del'Arte. It is trashy, ugly, not funny and an utter waste of time. The political message, all businessmen are baddies and tramps are good hearted decent people, is so naive and retarded that even L'Humanite has given it up long time ago. Its utterly amazing that Dupontel was ever given the 1000 that this movie must have cost. Dupontel's attacks on consumerism are painfully boring. One ray of sunshine though, Claude Perron who plays Marie the ex porno star. A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0259711/","name":"Vanilla Sky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzFlMTJjYzUtMWFjYy00NjkyLTg1Y2EtYmZkMjdlOGQ1ZGYwL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0259711/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"michael-dawes5"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Much maligned classic","reviewBody":"A great version of the original . Bitter sweet , beautifully filmed , full of melancholy

The best thing about this film is the soundtrack , I got it when it came out because it has a new version of R.E.M's 'All the right friends' and I love that they use 'Sweetness Follows' . It just seems that films around this period really used songs well , similar to 'Cruel Intentions' in this respect

programme.title: Chronicle
Chronicle
programme.desc:
Chronicle: Directed by Josh Trank. With Dane DeHaan, Alex Russell, Michael B. Jordan, Michael Kelly. Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1706593/","name":"Chronicle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRkY2RhM2QtMjQwNC00NDVjLTk4MTQtZGNiMjYxMmJmODVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1706593/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkrauser-81-311064"},"dateCreated":"2012-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sometimes a Gimmick is All you Need","reviewBody":"Like many of you, I gleamed at the trailer and poster with a heavy amount of skepticism. "Yet another superhero-esque film" I thought, this time brought to the screen with the increasingly hawkeyed hand-held style. Is this really necessary? Well no, its not, but its a lot of fun.

The plot you can decipher from the trailer; three teenagers, Andrew, Steve and Matt find a hole in the ground and uncover something that gives them the power to move things with their minds. Then they act as any normal teenager would if suddenly given superpowers, they goof off. Things however get murky when Andrew (Dane DeHaan) begins lashing out as his broken family life becomes too much for him to bare. Actors Michael B. Jordan and Alex Russell complete the triptych as the local high school's popular kid and Andrew's too-cool-for-school cousin.

Capturing teenage angst on film has always seemed like a real struggle for Hollywood. Common knowledge dictates that if you faced the camera towards a group of well groomed twenty-somethings and relegated them to a particular clique it'll all work out. Yet "Chronicle's" script expands on that world without making it "the film". Steve is popular because he is genuinely a sociable guy not because he's some feckless ladder climber. On the flip-side of the coin, Andrew is withdrawn and anti-social because his mother is ill and his father is an alcoholic with a rage problem. These are very real issues that are glossed over or ignored in average teen movies.

But this isn't just a coming-of-age tale, its also a showcase for emerging talents, director Josh Trank and screenwriter Max Landis. While some of the camera tricks and dialogue may seem contrived at times there's no denying their boundless creativity. Trank breathes new life into the 'Blair Witch' gimmick taking "footage" from a wide array of hand-held gadgetry to create a pretty convincing collage, or dare I say chronicle.

As the three climb into the hole to investigate one of them makes a reference to Plato's allegory of the cave. Perhaps a quote from 'Alice in Wonderland' would have been more apt. Like Alice all three are young, surprisingly accepting of the situation and about to enter a world where the natural laws of physics need not apply.

http://theyservepopcorninhell.blogspot.com/","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":244808,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-02-03","keywords":"troubled teen,found footage,levitation,video camera,supernatural power","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2464325145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ5OTQ2ODU5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzc4NTkxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ5OTQ2ODU5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzc4NTkxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery. Soon, though, they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2851530/","name":"Dane DeHaan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3887625/","name":"Alex Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0430107/","name":"Michael B. Jordan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2503633/","name":"Josh Trank"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0484840/","name":"Max Landis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2503633/","name":"Josh Trank"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Legend of Zorro
La légende de Zorro
programme.desc:
The Legend of Zorro: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Alberto Reyes, Julio Oscar Mechoso, Gustavo Sánchez Parra, Adrian Alonso. Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0386140/","name":"The Legend of Zorro","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE1MjVmYTYtOGFjZi00NGM3LTg0ZTEtNWI4MGI3NmM1MTVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0386140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"christian123"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not an Oscar quality film but it could make for a fun night at the movies","reviewBody":"Antonio Banderas is back under the mask of Zorro, the 19th Century swashbuckler who must face another dangerous mission, although he promised his wife Elena (Catherine Zeta-Jones) that he'd give up his life of adventure for a quiet family life as Alejandro de la Vega. But those who opposed California becoming a state in the Union are planning a new threat that might change their plans.

The Mask Of Zorro was a pretty good film. The sequel isn't as good yet it's still enjoyable. I personally would rather have the PG-13 rating but surprisingly the sequel didn't actually suck. I have to give credit to the cast and director. Martin Campbell knows how to direct action and he made this film very entertaining to watch. The story is a little weak and there isn't really anything new to found here but the action makes up for that.

The acting is solid just like the first one. Antonio Banderas takes the role of Zorro again and he does a good job. Catherine Zeta Jones returns as Elena and she also does a pretty good job. These two have a lot of chemistry together and they are interesting to watch on screen. The new addition to the cast and the person who almost ruined the film is Adrian Alonso. He plays Joaquin, the son of Zorro and Elena. He has a few funny lines but for the most part, he is really annoying. His role should have been cut since he almost ruined the entire movie.

Many people are complaining that the new rating kills the film and I disagree. The fight scenes are tamer and safer when compared to the original. He actually doesn't really use his sword to kill nor is much blood shown. However, the fight scenes are still pretty good and there are a lot of entertaining scenes like the train scene at the end. There were some boring scenes but they didn't last long. Also, the film is really cheesy and some of this does get annoying, nothing too major though. In the end, if you expect something like the original movie than you will end up disappointed. However, if you want something in the vein of National Treasure, a safe family action film, then this sequel is for you and it can really be enjoyed by adults too. Rating 6/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":96895,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-11-09","keywords":"abraham lincoln character,good versus evil,good man,good woman,four word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Legend of Zorro","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4092920089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMyZTUwNDMtZWQ2ZC00MjFhLWE5MzYtYTk3MDFlOTBiYTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMyZTUwNDMtZWQ2ZC00MjFhLWE5MzYtYTk3MDFlOTBiYTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001876/","name":"Catherine Zeta-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132178/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649460/","name":"Roberto Orci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nos plus belles vacances
Nos plus belles vacances
programme.desc:
Nos plus belles vacances: Directed by Philippe Lellouche. With Gérard Darmon, Julie Gayet, Philippe Lellouche, Vanessa Demouy. Over this long hot summer, Claude and Isabelle get their marriage back on track, while Bibou and Simon, spend a memorable summer discovering the world of grown-ups." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2153905/","name":"Nos plus belles vacances","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkzNTk4MDUyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Over this long hot summer, Claude and Isabelle get their marriage back on track, while Bibou and Simon, spend a memorable summer discovering the world of grown-ups.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2153905/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FrenchEddieFelson"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing like a self-congratulatory session","reviewBody":"During the heat wave of the 76 summer, a family of Parisians turns up at Le Rocher Abraham, a picturesque village in Brittany where time seems frozen, not far from Mont Saint-Michel and Saint-Malo.

Expect a deliberate but excessive avalanche of clichés and stereotypes. At first, the manifold characters are rather endearing. Then you will probably be quickly irritated by the good Samaritan who brings a providential help to the local rednecks. Pathetically appalling! Not to mention, even if it's clearly secondary, plethoric anachronisms such as: Dave's Vanina was released in 1977, the law Veil was presented at the National Assembly on November 1974 and then promulgated in January 1975, ...

As a synthesis, I liked the performances of Julie Gayet and Gérard Darmon, the 70's dress code, the vintage cars and the typical old houses of Brittany. But the film sorely lacks of subtlety and suffers from an excess of naivety. 3/4 of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":297,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-03-07","keywords":"brittany,summer holiday,year 1976,countryside","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1449048601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODExMmM2NjktZGNlNi00MGM0LWFhZWEtN2Y5NDY1YzQ2ZjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODExMmM2NjktZGNlNi00MGM0LWFhZWEtN2Y5NDY1YzQ2ZjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201462/","name":"Gérard Darmon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0310865/","name":"Julie Gayet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500977/","name":"Philippe Lellouche"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500977/","name":"Philippe Lellouche"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0375502/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069340/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2167460/","name":"Frédéric Petitjean"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Birds of Prey et la fantabuleuse histoire de Harley Quinn
programme.desc: Harley Quinn, criminelle endurcie de Gotham City, se souvient de son enfance et de ses jeunes années : née Harleen Quinzel, enfant abandonnée par un père alcoolique, éduquée par des soeurs très rigoristes, très tôt sujette à des accès de violence et finalement brillante étudiante en psychologie. C'est en devenant psychiatre à l'asile d'Arkham, qu'elle croise le chemin du Joker, dont elle tombe amoureuse, et qui fait d'elle une criminelle. Après une rupture brutale, la jeune femme décide de reprendre radicalement sa vie en main.

programme.title: Point Break
Point Break
programme.desc: Point Break: Directed by Ericson Core. With Edgar Ramírez, Luke Bracey, Ray Winstone, Teresa Palmer. A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2058673/","name":"Point Break","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxNDkzOTAyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyOTY3NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2058673/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Troy_Campbell"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impressive action sequences let down by almost everything else.","reviewBody":"A Gen Z update to Kathryn Bigelow's 1991 cult classic, this remake is essentially an episode of Fast and Furious in which the vehicular exploits have been replaced with an assortment of extreme sports sequences. Constructed with an alarming amount of real footage and physical stunt work, the numerous action set pieces are rather impressive; a high octane wing-suit gliding scene and the tension-building rock climbing finale topping the list. Yet the impact of these daredevil stunts is wasted on a film that fails on almost every other level. Stemming from Kurt Wimmer's truly awful screenplay, every second not spent traversing a mountainside, soaring through the air or surfing a mammoth wave is cringe worthy and/or yawn inducing. Wimmer's dialogue attempts to be philosophical and Zen-like, but with clichéd stinkers like "the only law is gravity" and "everyone dies, it's just a matter of how", it's nothing short of unintentionally hilarious. Replacing the eternally cool Patrick Swayze was always going to be tough, however Edgar Ramirez does a solid job as charismatic eco-warrior Bohdi. The same can't be said for low-budget-Chris-Hemsworth hunk Luke Bracey though, who is so wooden as Johnny Utah he makes Keanu Reeves look like Daniel Day Lewis. This modern update boasts a handful of genuinely fantastic action sequences, yet they're not enough to warrant a recommendation in what is otherwise a limp and incoherent thriller.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60493,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2015-12-04","keywords":"criminal,bikini,time bomb,aerial camera shot,movie flop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2854073113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzgxODMwODg4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM0NTI4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzgxODMwODg4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM0NTI4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183149/","name":"Edgar Ramírez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3478396/","name":"Luke Bracey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935653/","name":"Ray Winstone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0179697/","name":"Ericson Core"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054452/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020509/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053177/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004488/","name":"Rick King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0407717/","name":"W. IMDb data; ttnr: 2058673, Title: Point Break, --- Description: Point Break: Directed by Ericson Core. With Edgar Ramírez, Luke Bracey, Ray Winstone, Teresa Palmer. A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2058673/","name":"Point Break","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxNDkzOTAyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyOTY3NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2058673/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Troy_Campbell","dateCreated":"2016-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impressive action sequences let down by almost everything else.","reviewBody":"A Gen Z update to Kathryn Bigelow's 1991 cult classic, this remake is essentially an episode of Fast and Furious in which the vehicular exploits have been replaced with an assortment of extreme sports sequences. Constructed with an alarming amount of real footage and physical stunt work, the numerous action set pieces are rather impressive; a high octane wing-suit gliding scene and the tension-building rock climbing finale topping the list. Yet the impact of these daredevil stunts is wasted on a film that fails on almost every other level. Stemming from Kurt Wimmer's truly awful screenplay, every second not spent traversing a mountainside, soaring through the air or surfing a mammoth wave is cringe worthy and/or yawn inducing. Wimmer's dialogue attempts to be philosophical and Zen-like, but with clichéd stinkers like "the only law is gravity" and "everyone dies, it's just a matter of how", it's nothing short of unintentionally hilarious. Replacing the eternally cool Patrick Swayze was always going to be tough, however Edgar Ramirez does a solid job as charismatic eco-warrior Bohdi. The same can't be said for low-budget-Chris-Hemsworth hunk Luke Bracey though, who is so wooden as Johnny Utah he makes Keanu Reeves look like Daniel Day Lewis. This modern update boasts a handful of genuinely fantastic action sequences, yet they're not enough to warrant a recommendation in what is otherwise a limp and incoherent thriller.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60493,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2015-12-04","keywords":"criminal,bikini,time bomb,aerial camera shot,movie flop","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2854073113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzgxODMwODg4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM0NTI4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzgxODMwODg4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM0NTI4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists. programme.title: The Gunman
The Gunman
programme.desc:
The Gunman: Directed by Pierre Morel. With Sean Penn, Jasmine Trinca, Javier Bardem, Ray Winstone. A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2515034/","name":"The Gunman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2MzE5ODY5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI0NjM1NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2515034/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mohancraig"},"dateCreated":"2015-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not that good","reviewBody":"Some performances were better than others, the ultimate goal of the movie took forever to get off the ground (like the first half)... I miss the old Sean Penn who took roles displaying his raw talent over these emotionally enriched character development stories which quite frankly come off as emotionally supercharged in my book.

The film has some good shootout sequences and Javier Bardem is a joy to watch but the story just isn't there for any kind of connection to the rest of the characters, I'm kind of surprised this emo-fest wasn't the brainchild of Clint Eastwood to begin with.

What action sequences there are well done but there are far too few for a movie called "The Gunman".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":40339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2015-03-20","keywords":"blood vomiting,interpol,kicked in the face,eye gouging,impalement","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi796700185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1NjM3MDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTAwMDM1NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1NjM3MDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTAwMDM1NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The A former Special Forces soldier and military contractor suffering from PTSD tries to reconnect with his long time love, but first must go on the run from London to Barcelona and across Europe in order to clear his name.

programme.title: The Conjuring
Conjuring : Les dossiers Warren
programme.desc:
The Conjuring: Directed by James Wan. With Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Lili Taylor, Ron Livingston. Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1457767/","name":"The Conjuring","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NjA1NDMyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQzNDMzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1457767/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mungflesh"},"dateCreated":"2013-06-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"New life breathed into a classic sub-genre","reviewBody":""Don't summon the devil, don't call the priest ..."

I was one of a lucky few to have seen The Conjuring at a preview screening for FrightFest 2013.

I went in totally cold, not having seen a trailer, nor knowing anything about the story or plot and it turned out to be one of the best scary horror movies I have ever seen.

The Conjuring is a nail-biting, hiding-behind-hands movie. If you've been disappointed with the likes of Paranormal Acivity and Insidious, this one is likely to deliver in areas where they failed.

It tells the supposedly true story of two paranormal investigators, who aim to rid families and properties of their suspected supernatural visitations, either by disproving them (if they turn out to be just creaky floorboards or slamming doors) or tackling them head-on if not. A leap of faith is required to buy into this theme but if you're okay with it, then the movies plays out pretty well within its genre confines.

The particular incident they are brought in to deal with is described as surrounding a spirit 'so malevolent' it was hidden from the public until only now. In fairly Amityville-like circumstances, a family move into a new house and discover the basement is sealed; boarded-up behind a doorway.

It's not at all surprising what follows, once they decide to take a look in the basement but it is surprising how James Wan has managed to take such a tired theme of haunting and possession and revive it so convincingly.

I am no stranger to these kind of movies but this one truly tops them all for tension and terror. I really enjoyed Sinister recently, which I found to be equally as scary but it lost its way a bit towards the end, whereas The Conjuring keeps tempo and has a fairly satisfying conclusion. 

I particularly liked the way the film took a turn for the comical somewhere in the middle, only for perhaps five minutes, then came back firing on all cylinders as it headed to the finale. If this was intentional, to lure us into a false sense of security, it worked beautifully.

If you're the type to poo-poo this genre in general, I can't see you suddenly being converted to a believer but, if you enjoy classic horror like The Exorcist, The Amityville Horror and Poltergeist, I can almost guarantee The Conjuring won't disappoint.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":472834,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-07-19","keywords":"ghost,exorcism,possession,haunted house,supernatural power","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3819874585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjQzNDQ5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzMTg3OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjQzNDQ5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzMTg3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267812/","name":"Vera Farmiga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515296/","name":"Ron Livingston"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179825/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370937/","name":"Chad Hayes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370928/","name":"Carey W. I went in totally cold, not having seen a trailer, nor knowing anything about the story or plot and it turned out to be one of the best scary horror movies I have ever seen.

The Conjuring is a nail-biting, hiding-behind-hands movie. If you've been disappointed with the likes of Paranormal Acivity and Insidious, this one is likely to deliver in areas where they failed.

It tells the supposedly true story of two paranormal investigators, who aim to rid families and properties of their suspected supernatural visitations, either by disproving them (if they turn out to be just creaky floorboards or slamming doors) or tackling them head-on if not. A leap of faith is required to buy into this theme but if you're okay with it, then the movies plays out pretty well within its genre confines.

The particular incident they are brought in to deal with is described as surrounding a spirit 'so malevolent' it was hidden from the public until only now. In fairly Amityville-like circumstances, a family move into a new house and discover the basement is sealed; boarded-up behind a doorway.

It's not at all surprising what follows, once they decide to take a look in the basement but it is surprising how James Wan has managed to take such a tired theme of haunting and possession and revive it so convincingly.

I am no stranger to these kind of movies but this one truly tops them all for tension and terror. I really enjoyed Sinister recently, which I found to be equally as scary but it lost its way a bit towards the end, whereas The Conjuring keeps tempo and has a fairly satisfying conclusion. 

I particularly liked the way the film took a turn for the comical somewhere in the middle, only for perhaps five minutes, then came back firing on all cylinders as it headed to the finale. If this was intentional, to lure us into a false sense of security, it worked beautifully.

If you're the type to poo-poo this genre in general, I can't see you suddenly being converted to a believer but, if you enjoy classic horror like The Exorcist, The Amityville Horror and Poltergeist, I can almost guarantee The Conjuring won't disappoint.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":472834,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-07-19","keywords":"ghost,exorcism,possession,haunted house,supernatural power","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3819874585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjQzNDQ5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzMTg3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjQzNDQ5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzMTg3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives. https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NjA1NDMyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQzNDMzOQ@@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Gangster Squad
Gangster Squad
programme.desc:
Gangster Squad: Directed by Ruben Fleischer. With Sean Penn, Holt McCallany, Wade Williams, James Landry Hébert. It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1321870/","name":"Gangster Squad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwMjAyMTUzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODgxNzk1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1321870/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hitchcockthelegend"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rat-a-tat-tat!","reviewBody":"Gangster Squad is directed by Ruben Fleischer and written by Will Beal. It stars Josh Brolin, Sean Penn, Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Nick Nolte, Anthony Mackie, Giovanni Ribisi, Robert Patrick and Michael Pena. Music is by Steve Jablonski and cinematography by Dion Beebee.

Los Angeles is being brought to its knees by crime boss Mickey Cohen (Penn). In one of the darkened offices of the police department, a special squad of officers is being assembled. Given free licence to bring Cohen and his operations down by any means necessary, the Gangster Squad fight fir with fire.

Loosely based on real life facts, Gangster Squad is a good old slice of machine gun etiquette. An all star cast get to play good guys and wise guys in The Untouchables tradition, even if that in itself can't quite lift the film to the higher echelons of gangster movies past and present.

There's absolutely nothing new here, it plays out as expected. Brolin and Gosling are the main smooth operators in the good guys camp, the former given the family man in danger sub-plot, the latter given the dangerous dame to fall in love with in the shapely form of Emma Stone, who as it happens is also dating Cohen! Hmm... 

Over in the wise guys department is Penn on full tilt sweary and hammy overdrive. It's a very colourful portrayal, menacing and completely over the top. How the performance sits with you will greatly depend on how you find Penn as an actor when let loose on a cartoon characterisation.

It's all very period pleasing, with a bustling late 40s L.A. hosting men with hats, trench coats and tommy-guns. Men who frequent the speakeasy bars as torch singers warble their stuff. There is nothing wrong with the production at all, except maybe when the dialogue veers to clunky. The action scenes are well crafted, loud, bloody and exciting, and the photography sparkles and the music soars.

If only the makers had put some thought into it, a bit of brains to go with the brawn. As a comic book type gangster piece, it works well on entertainment terms, elsewhere its lightweight and formula compliant, with the Ribisi, Patrick and Pena characters telegraphed a mile away. So, quite some way away from the great The Untouchables then, but better than Mullholland Falls. Make of that what you will. 6.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":210132,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-01-11","keywords":"police vigilantism,year 1949,smoking after sex,interrogation,torture","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1360831513","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzNjQ1MTA4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDYzMzA2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzNjQ1MTA4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDYzMzA2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the LAPD's fight to keep East Coast Mafia types out of Los Angeles in the 1940s and 50s."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000576/","name":"Sean Penn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331516/","name":"Ryan Gosling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1297015/","name":"Emma Stone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281508/","name":"Ruben Fleischer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226345/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3263825/","name":"Will Beall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4624299/","name":"Paul Lieberman"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
La neuvième porte
programme.desc:
The Ninth Gate: Directed by Roman Polanski. With Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin, Emmanuelle Seigner. A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0142688/","name":"The Ninth Gate","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q1ZTFhMmYtNDljMS00Y2ZhLWE3M2QtMjYwYmFkYmJmMjI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0142688/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Bloodfordracula"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Film - Highly Underrated","reviewBody":"The Ninth Gate is a great film and one of Roman Polanski's most underrated films. Twenty years from now people will give this film the respect it deserves and hail it to be the great film that it is. 

Fist of all The Ninth Gate is not an action film. It's a slow-paced psychological thriller very similar in tone and style to Polanski's earlier films Chinatown and Frantic. Johnny Depp and Frank Langella both give great performances. Darius Khondji's photography is amazing and it has an even more amazing score by Kilar. The majority of the film was shot on location and is like a guided tour through Europe.

Ignore the negative reviews and comments from people who've been brainwashed and blinded by the current Hollywood fast-food style of film making with the intention of only appealing to the lowest common denominator. A review doesn't make a good film better or a bad film worse. A superb film. Rating 10 out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173831,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-08-25","keywords":"rare book,book detective,bibliophilia,satanic,unholy book","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Ninth Gate","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2649817369","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU3MDEwNzgtMjU1NC00OTY0LTg2NzMtMzY5ZTNjMWRjNjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU3MDEwNzgtMjU1NC00OTY0LTg2NzMtMzY5ZTNjMWRjNjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001449/","name":"Frank Langella"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000565/","name":"Lena Olin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000591/","name":"Roman Polanski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014903/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024473/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027161/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702416/","name":"Arturo Pérez-Reverte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115224/","name":"John Brownjohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881762/","name":"Enrique Urbizu"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

An unhappily married woman struggles to break free from social pressures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1654829/","name":"Thérèse Desqueyroux","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MzQ0NTk2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDE2MDY3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unhappily married woman struggles to break free from social pressures.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1654829/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tao902"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Who cares?","reviewBody":"Therese (Audrey Tautou) endures an unhappy marriage of convenience to an arrogant landowning neighbour. Her best friend, Anne, begins a passionate affair with a local man who is regarded by her family as unacceptable as he is not from such wealthy stock. When Therese learns that her husband's medicine contains arsenic she deliberately gives him overdoses that bring him close to death. Her life eventually deteriorates to the point where she commits suicide.\n\nNot a particularly engaging film. It was difficult to sympathise with the main character and it would have made more sense for the film to focus on Therese's best friend whose affair had been undermined.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3745,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"f rated,forest,character name as title,two word title,literature on screen","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2224335129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTQ2OTc2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY3Mzk3OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTQ2OTc2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY3Mzk3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1920s France, a provincial housewife's suffocating marriage to a boorish landowner inspires her to a fatal bid for freedom. An unhappily married woman struggles to break free from social pressures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1654829/","name":"Thérèse Desqueyroux","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MzQ0NTk2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDE2MDY3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unhappily married woman struggles to break free from social pressures.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1654829/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"tao902","dateCreated":"2015-07-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Who cares?","reviewBody":"Therese (Audrey Tautou) endures an unhappy marriage of convenience to an arrogant landowning neighbour. Her best friend, Anne, begins a passionate affair with a local man who is regarded by her family as unacceptable as he is not from such wealthy stock. When Therese learns that her husband's medicine contains arsenic she deliberately gives him overdoses that bring him close to death. Her life eventually deteriorates to the point where she commits suicide.\n\nNot a particularly engaging film. It was difficult to sympathise with the main character and it would have made more sense for the film to focus on Therese's best friend whose affair had been undermined.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3745,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"f rated,forest,character name as title,two word title,literature on screen","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2224335129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTQ2OTc2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY3Mzk3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTQ2OTc2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY3Mzk3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1920s France, a provincial housewife's suffocating marriage to a boorish landowner inspires her to a fatal bid for freedom. programme.title: Days of Thunder
Jours de tonnerre
programme.desc: Days of Thunder: Directed by Tony Scott. With Tom Cruise, Robert Duvall, Nicole Kidman, Randy Quaid. A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099371/","name":"Days of Thunder","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjc5NjQ1ODIzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjkwNTg4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099371/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LuboLarsson"},"dateCreated":"2007-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"I feel the need, the need for Speed","reviewBody":"The producers, director and star of Top Gun get together again for this above average racing drama. Its nowhere near as good as Top Gun of course but its no disaster. Tom Cruise is good as the daftly named racing driver Cole Trickle and the ever reliable Robert Duvall offers classy support. Michael Rooker is excellent as Toms rival and Randy Quaid shows a more serious side to those who only know him from the Vacation movies. Surprisingly the usually good Nicole Kidman is rather bland as the love interest although to be fair she's not given a heck of a lot to work with. The music is of course all important in a movie like this and it has a pretty good soundtrack including Maria McKee's Number One hit Show Me Heaven, but again Top Gun had a much better soundtrack with Hans Zimmmer no match for Harold Faltermeyer. Tony Scott directs with his usual style, if you have seen Top Gun or Beverly Hills Cop 2 you'll no what to expect, very flashy and VERY LOUD. With a slightly less predictable story this could have been a lot better but as it is its a pretty enjoyable way to pass a couple of hours.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83666,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1990-06-27","keywords":"ticklishness,motor vehicle,motor car,cool,vehicle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000173/","name":"Nicole Kidman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000380/","name":"Robert Duvall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001801/","name":"Robert Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
Vanilla Sky
programme.desc:
Vanilla Sky: Directed by Cameron Crowe. With Tom Cruise, Penélope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell. A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0259711/","name":"Vanilla Sky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzFlMTJjYzUtMWFjYy00NjkyLTg1Y2EtYmZkMjdlOGQ1ZGYwL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0259711/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"michael-dawes5"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Much maligned classic","reviewBody":"A great version of the original . Bitter sweet , beautifully filmed , full of melancholy

The best thing about this film is the soundtrack , I got it when it came out because it has a new version of R.E.M's 'All the right friends' and I love that they use 'Sweetness Follows' . It just seems that films around this period really used songs well , similar to 'Cruel Intentions' in this respect

It's much maligned for some reason , but it's a visual feast and full of emotion with fantastic performances, especially from the female leads , Diaz and Cruz","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":255284,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Fantasy","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-01-23","keywords":"dream,death,mask,nightmare,mental institution","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Vanilla Sky","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3806331161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWM4YTZjZTEtMmM5My00ZTEyLWE2MWUtM2M0OWI4ZTNkNzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWM4YTZjZTEtMmM5My00ZTEyLWE2MWUtM2M0OWI4ZTNkNzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004851/","name":"Penélope Cruz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001081/","name":"Cameron Crowe"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024622/","name":"Alejandro Amenábar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317834/","name":"Mateo Gil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001081/","name":"Cameron Crowe"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Other Man
The Other Man
programme.desc: The Other Man: Directed by Richard Eyre. With Laura Linney, Antonio Banderas, Liam Neeson, Romola Garai. The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0974613/","name":"The Other Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNDMyNzk1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU1MTk3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0974613/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jacobson98"},"dateCreated":"2010-05-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting Film That Needs a Better Edit","reviewBody":"This film is ultimately disappointing and deserving of its relatively low rating because its edit is annoying and telegraphs where it is going. World-class actors contribute tension and pace and a poor edit simply brings the movie to a complete stop. If ever there was an example of how important editing is to a movie, this is it. Film classes should look at this movie, deconstruct it, and put it back together in a more interesting way. If you watch this film, think about simply reordering several scenes to build tension and mystery and remove confusion. It's a worthwhile exercise. Movies are a complex undertaking that requires contributions of so many -- many folks labored over this film but the folks who put it together just didn't have the talent to pull it off.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11705,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-09-30","keywords":"cheating wife,plot twist,shoes,e mail,love","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Other Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1295450649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MTIxMzE1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MTIxMzE1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001473/","name":"Laura Linney"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264236/","name":"Richard Eyre"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0215713/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264236/","name":"Richard Eyre"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0939606/","name":"Charles Wood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0772384/","name":"Bernhard Schlink"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

The Gunman
programme.desc:
The Gunman: Directed by Pierre Morel. With Sean Penn, Jasmine Trinca, Javier Bardem, Ray Winstone. A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2515034/","name":"The Gunman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2MzE5ODY5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI0NjM1NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2515034/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mohancraig"},"dateCreated":"2015-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not that good","reviewBody":"Some performances were better than others, the ultimate goal of the movie took forever to get off the ground (like the first half)... I miss the old Sean Penn who took roles displaying his raw talent over these emotionally enriched character development stories which quite frankly come off as emotionally supercharged in my book.

The film has some good shootout sequences and Javier Bardem is a joy to watch but the story just isn't there for any kind of connection to the rest of the characters, I'm kind of surprised this emo-fest wasn't the brainchild of Clint Eastwood to begin with.

What action sequences there are well done but there are far too few for a movie called "The Gunman".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":40339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2015-03-20","keywords":"blood vomiting,interpol,kicked in the face,eye gouging,impalement","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi796700185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1NjM3MDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTAwMDM1NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1NjM3MDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTAwMDM1NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The A former Special Forces soldier and military contractor suffering from PTSD tries to reconnect with his long time love, but first must go on the run from London to Barcelona and across Europe in order to clear his name.
